website_summaries.verdict: A medium-firm hybrid spring-foam mattress that works well for side and back sleepers.
pros: This hybrid mattress has a three-zone spring construction to provide targeted support and is topped with medium-firm gel memory foam for comfort
Keeps side and back sleepers aligned and supported
Foam topper doesn’t have an odor when new
cons: Takes up to three days to fully expand after unpacking

customer_reviews.title: Great longtime bed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m single and sleep alone most nights and I love the bed. All of the people that have slept in my bed also comment on how nice it is. The queen size is actually a queen size. Very easy to open and set up. Kinda fun actually.
customer_reviews.author: TuShells

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Our last mattress cost almost $3,000 and after 11 years was ready for the trash. Tired of waking up in pain, we decided to try a mattress in a box. We researched all of the different ones and picked this one because of the reviews. The mattress arrived in two days and was shockingly thin (we did know it had to expand). Within 4 hours, it was full size but we waiting the recommended 24 before putting it on the bed. It is so comfortable and we sleep so much better. We just purchased an RV and will be buying a queen size since I never want to sleep on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOST AMAZING KING SIZED MATTRESS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing mattress!!! We were surprised at the box and the delivery, but once it's unrolled, we haven't been happier! Thank you!!!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Ms Booville

customer_reviews.title: Love how comfortable it is!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the mattress. When I go in to read to him I end up falling asleep because it’s so comfortable. Great quality and so soft that I don’t even need a box spring. So I saved money just buying the mattress and not needing the box spring. I would highly recommend this mattress to anyone. My coworker even wants one now.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: What a bed!
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on this bed for two months now, it is just wonderful. No grooving is being observed or felt yet. By this time we would have established an impression on a normal mattress. We got the plush mattress and it is not real hard or real soft. Just right for our use. I must say that I was Leary when we received this bed in a box. Just make sure you have it close to it’s final location when you unleash the sealing plastic. Stand back and watch it go.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress did not ever rise to 12”. Approximately 4” around the edges is foam and wasted space. If you lay in this area, you feel like you will just slide off the edge. I still however gave the mattress a chance. After a couple weeks, I’m waking up every morning with neck and back pain and that never used to happen. The mattress came with a pamphlet with a 30 day satisfactory guarantee. After several emails with the company that appear to be in China, they told me to take it up with amazon. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: If you let it air out for day , the smell goes away!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress about 3 weeks ago and I have been sleeping great. My previous mattress was too hard and having back issues this mattress has completely turned my sleep around.this mattress actually helps in relieving most of that pain that other beds would cause. and we gave 2 hours to expand. There was a little bit of a plastic smell but that wore off by night time, probably just from the plastic wrapped around it for shipping. First night sleeping on it we were so shocked and happy with how comfortable it was. Far more comfortable than our old mattress ever was.
customer_reviews.author: John yip

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: Bed came as advertised. It’s very soft and sucks you into it. However, I’m a little over a month into ownership and my wife and I consistently experience shoulder pain while sleeping on this. This matress is not good for side sleepers. The only way to get comfortable is laying on your back. If you’re a back sleeper this thing is great. Edited: Changed my rating because of great customer service. They went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Having slept on this for around two month now. I can say that I love it. Particularly for the price ,this is a great mattress. I was actually a little worried about getting the 12"mattress,as I had previously slept on a standard mattress. I like this one better. It is surprisingly firm( in a good way). I suffer from lower back pain for which I am seeing a chiropractor, and this mattress has really helped my recovery. Even after a painful traction session. I can come home lay down on this mattress and sleep like a baby highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla kuskin

customer_reviews.title: didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would wait a few months before I gave my review. Glad I did. Because it didn't last long. It slept great for about 4 months and then it started to get the dreaded sink in. I loved it till then. Everything about it we liked till it got the sink hole. A mattress should last longer than 4 months. I don't understand why it so hard to get a mattress that will last a little while before you have to get a new one. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Piney Woods  Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. We read all the great reviews and decided to take a Chance. The results are in the pics. Looked like the rolling hills of the Smokey mountains..Junk!!! Luckily amazon refunded with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Peters

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our new sweetnight mattress! This mattress is comfy and supportive. It’s conforms to every curve and bend of my body. No more shoulder or lower back discomfort. My husband and I are sleeping so much better on it than on our old mattress. Fun to watch the mattress expand when the plastic is cut,too.
customer_reviews.author: jinzhan.chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this innerspring queen size mattress for my daughter who has lower back and hip pain. She slept on it for about two week now, she is no longer in pain. This queen mattress is absolutely perfect! The medium firmness molds to her body in just the right places...no more morning stiffness or backaches. It is as comfortable as my 3000 dollar memory foam mattress. You cant go wrong with this mattress. I definitely recommend the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The mattress has completed sagged in some spots after 45 nights of sleeping and have to find something that lasts a few years. I weigh less than 150 lbs and over 5 ft tall.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN buyer

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: first they arrived on time,and easy to unpack and place. its took approximately whole night to fully decompress. No ordors that I noticed at all.This queen mattress is incredible. It is very comfortable and is an amazing combination of soft and firm. we love this hybrid mattress that combin both innerspring and momery form, It’s helping a lot with the pain in my lower back. I’m sleeping much better than I have been, and I’ve recommended it to all of my friends. Thx sweetnigh it’s worth the price
customer_reviews.author: bjj

customer_reviews.title: 100% as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: ok, we've had it for a week plus now, and, we are totally satisfied! We are both comfortable even tho our sleeping styles are a bit different. Be warned, this is a heavy mattress and will take two of you to handle it. Since it takes 72 hours to completely decompress, we had to open it in another room then move it into place later. No smell, definitely well made and honestly can't tell the difference when laying on it from our old Sealy memory foam, even does a great job of supporting our larger frames without pressure points. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: V. Woyak

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome! Best part is it comes in a pretty standard box despite it being heavy.Give it some time to fluff out and be regular shape before use. I gave it two days and it was fine after that. My experience has been excellent with this mattress. It's the perfect firmness so my husband's back problems have disappeared.My husband and I are about 410 lbs combined and so far this has been one of the most comfortable beds we have slept on.
customer_reviews.author: Rynn Koo

customer_reviews.title: The Best Night's Sleep I've Had
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying a mattress in a box, but I have to tell you, it's the best mattress I've ever owned. As others have said, it's heavy, so have help moving it. I've had it four months now and look forward to going to bed. Never wake up with back ache or one of my arms asleep. No uncomfortable pressure points. Two friends have bought this same mattress after trying mine for only a few minutes. Can't say enough great things about the improvement in how well I sleep. The name says it: Sweetnight!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur P.

customer_reviews.title: Back pain
customer_reviews.text: When we first bought this mattress about 5 months ago I thought it was the best sleep I've ever had. The mattress was so comfortable. As the months have gone on I now have back pain for the first time in my life every single day. We've gone on vacation a few times since and each time the pain gets better when I'm sleeping in another bed...until we get back home. I can visibly see where the mattress sinks in certain spots over time. Very disappointed about spending so much on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't continue to be a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: Was nice for about 6 weeks but didn't inflate as much as it should after 2 days as instructed but I thought it would continue to be supportive. After a few months it became very soft and not supportive. Not Recommended if you have back pain or any other pain
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne J

customer_reviews.title: Super plush with no edge support
customer_reviews.text: If you like a super soft bed with horrible edge support, then this bed is for you. Literally rolled off the side as it has virtually no side support. Still cant figure out all the positive reviews on this bed. It provides a deep hug/cradle due to its super plush construction, and we found it to be very warm. Alot of reviews claimed it was hard so I am dumbfounded at my experience. Amazon as usual took care of the return with no issues. If your looking for back support (or any kind of support at all) stay away from this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: fightclub74

customer_reviews.title: Not strong at edges,  developed very high and low spots 14 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy but wore out *very* quickly. No side strength after just ten months. 14 months in, this mattress has developed huge high and low spots, making it impossible to move around. For eight months it was great, though. Overall disappointment. Just contacted the company. There is supposed to be a ten year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: SuperHaji

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it for my enemy.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a side sleeper, I would highly suggest to stay away from this mattress. It has caused me nothing but pain since I bought it. My upper back / shoulder area are on fire every single day. My neck is stiff all day and hurts to even look down. Do yourself a favor & find another mattress. (I NEVER write reviews, but if it’s so save someone from the pain I am feeling... it’s worth the two minutes to do!)
customer_reviews.author: SophiaF12

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this queen size mattress early June and I can feel the quality of my sleep has been improved since then. I am a side sleeper and this mattress gives me the support and softness I need.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SIDE SLEEPERS
customer_reviews.text: NOT A SIDE SLEEPER MATTRESS, DO NOT BELIEVE FAKE REVIEWS. If you like spooning your partner, or if you sleep with another human this is not the bed for you, as soon as I get close to my partner we sink in to the bed(it's less than a month in), and its so uncomfortable. Also not good for hot sleepers, hybrid means nothing, sleeps just as hot as a foam mattress. If you are looking for a firm mattress this is not a bad deal and, for 200 more you can go to a mattress store but the free delivery/customer service are the reason to choose a bed in a box, just read all reviews before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Had to call Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Mattress was shrink wrapped and never recovered. Thank God for Amazon standing behind this product.. the entire right side is collapsed to the box spring
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA N

customer_reviews.title: Soft Matress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this matress because the good reviews but definitely for me resulted too soft and after pay more than $600 definitely i want something good . I tried for 5 days after wait the recommended 72hrs and even that, the edges tend to sink a lot, same when i sleep close edgings, i dont like the feeling because after read carefully says is medium soft (I could say too soft for me). But anyway i ll be returning!
customer_reviews.author: AV Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: We Loved the mattress for the first three months, but after that it started to take the shape of your body and sink. I fluctuate between 126 lbs and 140 lbs. six months in and my insomnia is back, and the pain in my back and hips are unbearable. I don't have any conditions that would cause this amount of pain. the same goes for my husband. I would suggest that this mattress is for people who are 120 lbs or less.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Petrowski

customer_reviews.title: Worst. Mattress. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress came before a bed frame, so we were sleeping on it on the floor. Which means, I had the opportunity to stand on it several times. It immediately reminded me of standing on a blow up, flotation pool toy. No support. I’m not picky, but I hate this mattress so much, it’s hard to believe the high reviews. Now I don’t trust anything or know what’s real. There’s no way all these people loved this mattress, unless I got a dud. In any case, amazon refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: asmciver

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it let me start off by saying it us soft but the top and bottom of the bed is low and for some reason the middle of the bed is way higher and it does not feel comfortable at all to sleep on . Why is the bed different levels should it be completely flat? I spent so much money on this bed
customer_reviews.author: Yashaira

customer_reviews.title: All the features I need. Really love it
customer_reviews.text: OMG! It definitely meets my expectation which is perfect match with my bed frame. I love it so much. I don’t know why the picture is upside down. It is really comfortable which is firm enough for me. This mattress comes compressed and rolled up as long rectangular which is mattress width. It is really heavy. It contains 5 layers as the description. I am giving the shot of the wrapped pocketed steel coils mattress that I feel it will be too soft for me. It definitely surprises me that might be the memory foam helps. I really love my new bed and the design of the mattress. It has all the features I need. Cool, comfortable, firm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Medium firm and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a 12-inch hybrid mattress which could relieve my back and shoulder pain for a while. But I was worrying to get a mattress online cause I cannot touch it. I am glad this sweetnight is as described As it reviewed. It's well packed in a box, very comfortable and medium-firm, soft but supportive: the foam adjust to my body shape and allowed me to sleep comfortably in any position. I do not feel pain the second morning. One thing needs to point out: excellent edge support, not worry about falling off when lying on the edge. Absolutely love it! Remember to expand it (without anything on it) for 72 hours before sleeping on.
customer_reviews.author: elaine～

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a mattress online without actually checking it out first. It’s been a really good experience. Don’t be alarmed when the box arrives...the mattress is basically vacuumed sealed and rolled into a tall rectangular box, like a column. Getting it setup is really easy. The 72 hour waiting period is a little annoying but honestly, not that big of a deal. There is definitely a difference in the mattress if u try it before the 72 hours. Don’t rush that. It’s really comfortable. It’s pillow top. The 10 year warranty gives me a peace of mind as well. My toddler loves jumping on it and it looks like it will hold up a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Very good mattress for the price we paid for
customer_reviews.text: At first we don't know what to think of buying a mattress in a box let along its made in China. But after reading the reviews and researching their company website we decided to give a try. Our first impression is this mattress is heavy! I had my nephews carry it upstairs close to our bed frame. As per instruction, we let it sit for 72 hours so the mattress will expand to the fullest. We love everything about this mattress being almost perfect to our liking. Firm and soft at the same time won't disappoint most people looking for a good and economical mattress in a box.
customer_reviews.author: toto

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I got this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am truly glad I bought this mattress! It’s fully 12 inches and it’s really comfy. I got my back injured last year and it’s been painful since then. I know I need a mattress firmer but soft, can support my back nicely when I turn around. I want a mattress made with coils and memory foam on top of it. This one just has everything I want in it. $500 is a pretty big budget for me, but I’m glad I got it because the quality of my sleep gets a lot better. The amazon customer service is really nice and helpful, I got well taken care of when I have questions.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn love

customer_reviews.title: worth it. great value
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome. It came in a cacuum package. It rebounds as soon as you cut off the plastic bag. Therefore,make sure you bring it to the room before you open it. Do not worry the odor. There is no wild odor with the new mattress. I really enjoyed my night. It is just the perfect medium soft and hard feeling!I had my old mattress costing $1000 at a famous brand mattress store. This new one is even better with less than half cost!I love the memory form topping!The hybrid is really nice choice. I had nice sleeping with my little son. Never expect a online shopping for mattress could be that valuable!Totally worth to buy!
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the fact that as soon as you unwrapped the mattress it fully expanded right before your eyes. We waited roughly 48 hours anyways before we sIept on it. I’ve never bought a mattress online before so I wasn’t exactly sure what to expect comfort wise but this is honestly one of the most comfortable mattresses I’ve ever slept on! Not too firm but you also don’t sink all the way in. I shopped around a lot before deciding on this mattress and I noticed that a lot of other mattresses had negative reviews claiming there was an overpowering mildew smell upon unboxing but this mattress doesn’t have a smell whatsoever! Superior quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Okay but won’t last
customer_reviews.text: I waited over a year to review. It is actually pretty comfortable and I can’t say I’ve had the same experience as some of the disgruntled purchasers. But I decided to write a review since I’ve noticed recently a very obvious “sink” in the middle of the mattress. It is a decently comfortable bed, but I’m not convinced it’s very robust and probably won’t be a long-term mattress. Being a Chinese brand, I can’t say I’m tremendously surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sleeping in my old mattress for a very long time, and was looking for a comfortable mattress. This mattress is not too soft, and it’s not too firm! My boyfriend doesn’t like my old mattress because it hurts his back, but he loves this one!! Super super comfortable! I would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried hard for a month to like it, it only seemed to get worse. It is way too firm for us, we got up every morning with back pain and wishing we hadn’t gotten rid of our old mattress. The only position we could sleep in was on our back and that was very uncomfortable. It’s a great looking mattress, well made but just not for us. We have set up a return and getting a different brand to try. Amazon was great to work with on the return.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: It's lumpy already and it's beginning to sink in on both sides
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping after a few months I would like the mattress. At first, it seemed to be comfortable and there was no sinking, now it's already beginning to feel like your stuck and the mattress top is beginning to break down, already. At this rate , I will need to buy a new mattress very soon. I would like a refund or replacement. Update: Well it's been almost 6 months and I am hurting throughout my back. I have emailed them twice without success due to failure of email legitimacy. I purchased through Synchroney bank and would really like a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I love this bed but I have to admit the scent of this mattress was strong and terrible...like chemically manufactured mildew...that I almost sent it back!! It took two weeks for it to finally fade, in spite of all the Febreezing and incense and 24 hour direct fan blowing. I look forward to climbing into bed each evening and hate to climb out! I had memory foam before this one that I loved but I needed a bit more support (and less heat!!) So glad I made the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I used to have a spring only bed , and a memory foaming bed . But this one combines both , it’s not too soft! Due to the spring on the bottom , it’s firm on the bottom and the top got those memory foaming thing make me sleep much better sideways. And most important it’s breathable ! Won’t feel hot sweating in summer ! I also like the way it was packed , a single box you opened it up it expanded rapidly! Just leaving it there for few hours and it’s all expanded and I’ve spend a week every night on it. So far no complaint ! Lovely !
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattreess
customer_reviews.text: My original mattress is slightly harder. This hybrid mattress is very comfortable and the size is right. I am satisfied with this queen size mattress. It is also breathable. The packaging is very good. I feel good after sleeping on this sweetnight mattress. I used to wake up several times every night, and now my sleep quality has improved significantly! The mattress has good resilience, and it is super comfortable to sleep on the hardboard bed or tatami. I regret not having bought it earlier, otherwise I would have missed such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Quality mattress that helped to eliminate my back pain
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this mattress. I’ve had it for a couple of months now and I am definitely keeping it. My back pain is 100% gone, I sleep so much better and my spine is definitely better aligned. I also like the fact that it was delivered to my house so that nobody to enter my house (during a pandemic) to set up the mattress. The edges of the mattress are a bit soft, but that was a minor mental adjustment to make. Note: it is heavy. I advise everyone who purchases this mattress to open the plastic wrap (seal) wherever you plan to keep it- make sure it is the right side up.
customer_reviews.author: Anya E. Tape

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really was afraid of not spending “enough “ on a new mattress. But after doing research and reading these good reviews I decided to take the plunge into the world of vacuum sealed mattress that don’t come from a big retailer. It came 3 days early.Heavier than expected, the Full size needed one people to get it out of the box....it unfolded immediately once punctured and I used it 6 hours after opening it . The first night was amazing. It did get firmer within the first 48 hours as it fully expanded to potential. It’s firm but the good dense firm, that allows you to sink in Sligo while still providing support. Pleasant purchasing, will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ni

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MATTRESS SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: Moving to a new home, because of this pandemic I shop most of my essentials online. To be honest, buying big and value stuff online is big challenge. Gladly I chose this mattress, it’s neither too firm nor too soft for me. After sleeping on it over half month, feeling so comfortable and energetic every morning I wake up. I would recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: amazing really
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We have only just received the mattress and as it is it’s extremely impressive. It’s soooo comfortable. I mean sooooo comfortable. We own a more expensive bed from one of the online retailers. We love ours so we wanted to buy one with similar stats for our child. This fit the bill and it’s just as comfortable! It expanded relatively quickly with basically no smell whatsoever. It was packaged very well and everything was clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress! While sleeping on it, my spouse and I can't feel or hear each other's movements in this bed. The mattress arrived thinking it needed 72 hours to inflate, but it didn't take that long. We slept on it the next night. The packing is very convenient. Hardness is also very moderate do not feel uncomfortable, sleep on it sleep quality is very good. I had been worried that the mattress would be too soft, but to my surprise it didn't. My kids like to sleep on it, too. Very pleasant shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: jianzhi cai

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress for 10 days only
customer_reviews.text: At first I set up this mattress according to the instructions. I payed a lot more for this mattress expecting to get a higher level of satisfaction from the average mattress. WRONG!!! STOP! DO NOT ORDER THIS CHINESE junk waste of money I wish I could give 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Hybrid at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality, this mattress can't be beat. My wife and I recently wanted to upgrade our mattress and started doing some research. After looking at all of the mattress in a box options, we decided to choose the Sweetnight King Hybrid. For the price, the quality of this mattress can't be beat. This is a Luxury Firm mattress so I'd say it's a 6.5 out of 10 on firmness. Maybe even better than the mattress, is the customer service. Every time I emailed them, they responded promptly and maintained a high level of professionalism. I would highly recommend them to anyone interested in a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable, strong bearing capacity, no sag
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping in this bed for a week. To be honest, I have a hard time finding a bed that fits me because I don't like it to be too soft, but not too hard. So it's hard to find one that fits my requirements. But this bed is pretty close to what I want. First of all, the load-bearing force is strong, not a little bit trapped in the feeling. And the surface is soft and soft. And there's no noise when you're wriggling on your back. But I bought queen size. I may need to buy a king size.and better to be more cheap hah
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good for side sleepers or stomach sleepers. Don’t buy it if you sleep on your back
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great for side sleepers or people that sleep on their stomach but if you sleep on your back it is not the perfect match. I slept a couple nights on my back and I was in a pain in the next morning. The most of the time I sleep on my stomach or on one side, and those days I wake up refreshed and feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: mileS

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Received in the box, and let it set for a couple days before setting up, Shipping was great, and super comfortable. This is a MEDIUM Firm Mattress so more cushion and soft, Honestly it compares to super expensive brands and very easy to get delivered and one person can move it. JUST A NOTE, Open it up IN THE ROOM you want to use it in and then undo the vacuum packaging makes moving much easier. Mine needed to expand took about a day or so and was like any fancy mattress you would buy at a retail location. Excellent and EASY!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick James

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for the Best and not expensive mattress, this is the one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wowww!!!! So impressed with this mattress. I bought this mattress online because of the virus, I didn’t want it to go to a mattress store. But I was so afraid that It wasn’t what I expected, anyways a took the chance and bought it. OMG this mattress is perfect. Not too soft and not too hard. It feels better than my old expensive mattress and for a awesome price. I am going to buy now another one for my son’s bed. I am 100% satisfied. And it came quick and well packaged. Happy costumer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend and I love our purchase with this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I love our purchase with this mattress. I’m not going to lie; I was a little skeptical before purchasing, but after we got the mattress and slept on it. WOW, we were amazed and immediately fell in love with the bed. It literally feels like you're sleeping on cloud, and it feels great. For the price of the mattress, we couldn't asked for a better one. We have looked at matress firm and everything were just overly priced. I would recommend this mattress to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Pan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quiet hybrid mattress
customer_reviews.text: We had been searching a good hybriod mattress for months, didn't find a good one until we reached this one. It seemed very good on descriptions then we decided give a try. We brought a queen size.After we received the package we were shocked by the amazing package which was totally different than traditional mattress pack. Unrolled it and had it just sit on floor for less than 5 hours, we can't wait to sleep on it and try. It is very comfortable, firm but not hard, it supported my body very well, I didn't feel the stiffness, soreness in the next morning as I used to be. We love it, comfortable and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Shihong Li

customer_reviews.title: king size mattress
customer_reviews.text: This matress came we in rolled it left it for 48 hrs slept on our new king bed he is one happy man and I'm loving my extra space and my amazing night sleep. This mattress is the perfect combination of plush and firm, providing amazing support of my lower back and hips. The magical part of this mattress purchase is that somehow this mattress works for both of us! AND he actually likes it! It seems firm at first and then you sink it just enough so it cradles you in any position. Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zheng

customer_reviews.title: OMG love it! It's so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best mattress I have ever owned. Got this about two weeks ago, this mattress is amazing it's like laying on a cloud. My husband and I needed a king size mattress sence our 1 year baby sleep with us, so after reading many reviews and price, we decided to go with this one and it's the best money spent this year. My husband is 200 lbs and has a bad back and he has been sleeping great on this mattress. Not too firm but not too soft, it's just right! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through most mattresses rating above 4 at Amazon. There is always 8% critical reviews. Since I prefer innerspring mattress, so I put my money on this for a try. We feel so far so good. Nice recovery, very supportive. Since I don't have back pain, I'll not make comments on pain relief. The only thing you need to think about is this mattress is 256lb. Moving this mattress upstairs is a pain. You definitely need some help. I'm glad with this mattress. Hope it can last for long.
customer_reviews.author: Caam

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable,  not too soft and not too firm
customer_reviews.text: My son’s old mattress was so bad that when you sat or laid down in it you could feel the springs inside. We wanted to get him a mattress that’s comfortable, not too soft and not too firm, and this mattress is exactly what we have been looking for. The mattress expands very quickly upon opening the box and as you can see from the photo, it’s very thick. It has springs on the bottom and pillow top on top. It provides enough support but not too hard and it’s very comfortable. My son has been super happy and satisfied since he got it.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this mattress for two months, and I will say it is the most comfort bed that I have ever owned. This is the first time I decided to buy a mattress online because of this special time so that I couldn't go to store. It shipped in a huge box and we rolled it to the bedroom directly according to the instruction. I put the mattress on the ground, and there was no any chemical smell. About three days later, I moved the mattress to our bed frame which first it well. The mattress is soft, but firm when we feel it. we spent every night on it with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Magic. It is a good and inexpensive mattress to start with, It’s so firm to support my back, but it is also soft for me to have a good night sleep. I have been trying different mattress out there but none of them fits my needs. Well, like a nice ones really needs to cost a fortune. I did some research and read a little for this one. So I decide to give it a shot. I guess I won in this case, still in love with my bed. Hopefully this can help a stranger. But do a little more digging you will like it even more. Forgot to say, g the e memory foam did it’s job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING Mattress!! My old mattress was too hard so I bought a pillow top for it, then I sank in it, not comfortable at all. I was reluctant to order a mattress in a Box, but had already ordered a pillow from sweetnight and was very pleased. The Box arrived intact, packaged well, unwrapped it and waited 72 hours and placed it on top of my box springs. I must say it is the most comfortable mattress I have ever slept in. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Dellas

customer_reviews.title: Meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: i moved from traditional coil mattress to a full memory foam which I regret, I didn’t get the firmness I want and my back pains got worse. This hybrid mattress provides the comfort of memory foam and the coil supports more firmness and pressure relief. I can roll around on the bed and sleeping on any position still feel comfortable, so I believe the supports are evenly distributed. I believe I have came to the right mattress and by writing my opinion to help other to make a better decision.
customer_reviews.author: 🐼mi

customer_reviews.title: A Transformative Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress as a present for my parents; Married just shy of 40 years, and still sleeping on a hand-me-down mattress that was given to them after the wedding. They have called it the best gift they ever received. Something that completely changed the way they sleep, and made a real positive change in their day to day lives. As for me, I think highly enough of the mattress that I'll be getting one for myself. Memory foam is a really excellent technology, and Sweetnight makes great use of it in these mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W.

customer_reviews.title: You can feel every spring
customer_reviews.text: Needs a minimum of 2in topper added on top of it. These comments are so misleading. Once i finally paid on this thing to go to sleep i had to pull the topper off my smaller bed temporarily
customer_reviews.author: IBEW DAYTONA BEACH

customer_reviews.title: great mattress. Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is perfect for me. It meets my requirements: it's a great value, light weight, easy for me to move.I sleep through the night and wake up feeling rested. Keep in mind this is a Sweetningt mattress. Don't get it unless that's the type of mattress you're accustomed to sleeping on. Really happy with this traditional innerspring mattress! Even though there are so many newer choices available, I really just wanted a simple, old school mattress for a platform bed. This is firm and comfortable and feels very even... instead of sinking into a spot. Also, budget-wise, this was an affordable option for a guest bedroom. 10year limited warranty!!! very professional!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mattress for the price. I was very happy with this purchase, the mattress is extremely comfortable and I found it really easy to unroll and setup. The mattress is medium hard and forms to my body nicely when lying down, it gives me just the right amount of support. I’ve been using this mattress for about two weeks now and I’ve noticed that my back pain has already gone away for the most part. Many mattresses I’ve purchased have had an odd smell upon opening that lingers but I didn’t have such an issue with this mattress. This was simply a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: A place to dream
customer_reviews.text: 1) It comfortable to sleep on 2) The quality is nature 3) The mattress is user friendly 4) It affordable 5) It lightweight 6) It high-grade 7) It very good in quality 8) It not hard 9) The mattress is soft 10) The mattress is rich and beautiful 11) It polished 12) It good to sleep on 13) It amazing 14) The mattress is high quality 15) It good 16) It soft 17) It awesome 18) A place to dream 19) It nature 20) The mattress doesn't give you back problems 21) It not too hard or too soft 22) It just perfect 23) The mattress is adaptable 24) It empathetid
customer_reviews.author: chenning359

customer_reviews.title: High quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: To sleep well, you need good bedding. I bought this mattress after reading a lot of product introductions and customer reviews. When I received this mattress, I opened the mattress package according to the instructions provided. Miracle happened. Mattress like It slowly expands automatically like magic and turns into a normal size mattress. It ’s amazing. I checked all corners of the mattress. It feels like the product introduction. The surface is soft and delicate. The size is correct. It is soft and hard. There is no odor when you lie down and turn around. Noise to sleep after a tiring day of work is very important and well worth buying this high quality mattress
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in many ways, except one
customer_reviews.text: Overall a comfortable and high quality feel to the mattress. For the price I am suprised how nice it feels. Firm yet soft/plush enough to mold to my curves during side or back sleeping. My only complaint would be that there is no side support to the mattress. No sturdy foam around the edges to keep the sides from easily collapsing when you sit on the edge of the bed. This will cause an issue in the future when the mattress gets older and more worn in and the sides start to bulge out or become weak. But for the price I am very happy with the comfort level it provides!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxury mattress Love it
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow this mattress really suprised me! Iv bought teice of this price but not as comfy as this one. Me and husband just moved to new house without any furniture. So I ordered this online and it arrived fast. We tried it at the day it comes. Very comfy not to soft not too hard. It is thick with memory foem which suits both me and hubby's need. Also it didn't make noise at all between me and hubby we can bareby feel eachother move during the night. I dont feel much about pain relief and this is truely comfort compared to the other mattress we paid over 1000dollars. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress to instead my old one.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is different. I can feel different from my last ordinary mattress when I lying in bed. The mattress I bought in the past will collapse once I lying in bed. The most uncomfortable thing is that I would feel backpain after whole night sleeping. This mattress is very comfortable and flexible. I sleep very well when I use this. What's more important it that it could prevent mites. By the way, the ordo of the new mattress is a little bit strong. You need to open your window for few days to make this smell disappear before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Better than twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from a queen to a king. Prior mattress was a Leeds that we were happy with, but now we are ecstatic. I am a 6’1”, 245 lb side sleeper. My wife is half my size and a stomach sleeper. We both love this mattress. I have no hip pain, only some with the Leesa, and much less turning over throughout the night, some with the Leesa. Basically it’s a bigger, better mattress than our queen, and half the price. Durability cannot be reviewed as it is only two weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee Turman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is a good buy for the price. It gives your body plenty of support and ensures a good night’s sleep. I bought this mattress been 20 days and I must say I am surprised so far is comfortable, I was so afraid cause I have a bad back and I am so scare to try new mattresses but I must say this one is good for me. This bed is for people who like firm but comfortable! I don’t wake up sore in the morning anymore! Fast delivery. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jie.L

customer_reviews.title: This is the mattress I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have changed several mattresses, but I haven't found a satisfactory one. My idea is very simple. Everyone spends one third of his/her sleeping time in a day, so he/she can live well and eat well. It doesn't matter whether I sleep well or not, so I've been looking for a mattress that I can sleep comfortably on, and I finally found it. This mattress is the one That I sleep comfortably on every day. It gives me more energy the next day to put into my work. People who sleep well will feel refreshed and work efficiency has also been improved a lot. It's a really good product. You who love your job deserve it too!
customer_reviews.author: AEdison

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this mattress and excellent for the price. The mattress is very firm and offers me great support, it’s much lighter than the old classic mattress that I had. I let it sit overnight to let it come to it's full height, and am delighted I do not need a box spring just a platform bed. So happy with it, went quickly and bought a mattress cover to protect it. It is so nice and soft lol
customer_reviews.author: allan lin

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and very supportive
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great and it works beyond our expectation. The top layer is memory foam, and it very comfortably soft,and most important, there is no odor from the memory foam. Inside there are many smaller springs to provide enough support for our body. The springs help the mattress to keep it shape. It will return to its shape quickly. The construction is strong, and it is a bit heavy but it will last a long time. We strongly recommend this mattress for anyone what a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jolin Xue

customer_reviews.title: Price understandable. Help your muscle pain.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been almost 3 weeks since i bought this mattress. The only thing I could say about this is. is that it’s awesome bed. my mom used to keep complaining about muscle back pain and now here she is (she’s so happy for buying her a new one). Im just grateful I bought the good one because Ive been looking for a bed that does the help, it heated your back (its like when youre having a massage, that feeling). Overall, The price makes it understandable because of how the bed does the work. I would really going to buy another one of this again for my 2 little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. It doesn’t have smell at all when we opened it. I love this mattress! I had been having hip pain for months being on a hard mattress. This mattress has a great luxurious memory foam topper built into it with just the perfect amount of fluff that I am finally comfortable and can sleep all the way through the night. So glad I bought it. Comfortable and supportive. I highly recommended this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress almost 1 month! It is so comfortable. We were excited to receive this mattress and finally get a nice, supportive night's sleep. This is not a plushy sink-into mattress. It is supportive and extremely comfortable. I want a mattress that I could set up by myself. It was shipped to me rolled up tightly inside the box. When I remove the plastic wrap that around the mattress quickly expanded on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful AB

customer_reviews.title: if you like firm good quality mattress, buy this one
customer_reviews.text: if you like firm mattress, you should buy this one. i hurt my back during work and any soft mattress would make it worse but i can sleep very well on this one. my kids like to jump on it in the early morning yet won't wake me up. the only thing i want to remind you is that it's over 100 pounds so you might need someone help you move it to your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: xinzhen

customer_reviews.title: VERY soft mattress, not for me but may work for you if light and like soft mattress.
customer_reviews.text: VERY SOFT, springs don't do much to support. If you sit on edge of bed you will come close to falling off due to how it just let's you sink to the box spring. I had upper back problems due to it and fiance went straight to the box spring when laying on it. That said if you like a very soft mattress and are around 150lbs to 175lbs it may work for you. I'm 6'3" 220 athletic and it was too soft for me.
customer_reviews.author: ITSMIKATIME

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: It was very well packaged and it was air sealed wrapped up. It was very easy to unseal and the instructions were very The bed is super soft which is perfect for me after a day of work. The last mattress that I brought was too hard for me. It didn’t really work well for me and I didn’t really felt good sleeping on hard mattress. Also I have back pain so I need soft mattress for sleeping. I felt very comfortable sleeping on the mattress which helped my back pain. This is a fabulous mattress and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Overall Experience is POSITIVE
customer_reviews.text: I tested it for two weeks before leaving a review. My overall experience is POSITIVE. Love it so far. The firmness of the mattress is a little bit over Medium firm, not too soft nor too hard because it’s first layer is made of foam and second layer consists spring coils. It is my style. No ‘special’ smell. Btw, it took over 24 hours to recover as it was vacuumed. It’s true to size and firmness. Hopes this helps finding your type of mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Arvan

customer_reviews.title: Firm mattress, minimum partner movement detection.
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical at first, was very cautious about this purchase because not sure if it would be firm enough. Quite pleased with the comfort and firmness, very easy to set up. Only complaint would be, if sitting on the edge as like getting in or out there isn't much edge support as in a conventional mattress, but have figured it out. Have looked at many mattresses and cost was at least twice as much, overall very happy with this product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Crate78

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! I have back and hip pain from a pretty nasty accident. I use to wake up unable to stand up straight and I would waddle around like a penguin most of the morning. That is not the case anymore! I wake up and can stand straight up and walk like a normal human being! I look forward to going to bed now and it's wonderful! I highly recommend this to anyone with back problems! You will sleep like a baby!
customer_reviews.author: ECJ

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised at the Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: We all know it can be scary to buy a mattress sight unseen. Like you, I read the reviews and took a chance since it was a great price. We have been sleeping on it for several weeks now and we are extremely happy. It took only a few hours to regain its full size from the box. No odor at all. My favorite part is the lack of movement when one of use gets in or out of bed while the other is asleep. We had been using a very expensive, traditional pillow top mattress and I would put this one up against it anytime. Hopefully it will hold up for a few years. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: sockmonkeydrummer

customer_reviews.title: great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I ordered this hybrid mattress!! I was surprised how much they compressed it. I have never bought a compressed mattress before. based on this experience I would not hesitate to do it again. The hybrid design works great, and delivers just the right combination of firmness and softness at the surface. M my husband and I both sleep on it comfortably. We are both over 6ft and 150lbs and 190lbs. We are both able to get out and into bed without waking the other one. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Wekinglee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I was worried about buying a mattress without feel it first, but I was not disappointed. This mattress is PERFECT for me. It’s extremely comfortable, plush yet firm. It arrived nice a vacuum sealed package inside a sturdy box. I removed the plastic and unrolled the mattress and thought there was no way it would rise to 12 full inches but it did in a matter of just a few minutes! I normally toss and turn in the middle of the night. Usually wake up with the sheets, and pillows all over the place. Since I started sleeping on this mattress I wake up feeling great and in the same position I asleep in. Feel fully rested
customer_reviews.author: nevergiveup

customer_reviews.title: This is a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the most satisfying mattress I've ever bought . It's soft but it won't collapse. I like this soft bed. I sleep comfortably and don't hurt my body,my husband likes it, too. The only downside is that it's a little too high,It's a little hard to sit on . But it was my fault,i don't have a sense of size,so got the wrong one . If you don't like it too high, you can buy 10 inch ,i think that's the best height.
customer_reviews.author: Ling Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I like a soft mattress, I was worried it would be too hard. It is firm but soft as well. It gives you the support needed but has the soft foam on top, so you sink into it slightly. After opening, it expanded to 11 inches almost immediately. By the next morning it was 12". There was no smell as some people described and I only waited one night before sleeping on it. Have owned it now for about 5 weeks and it is great and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: 3Greys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is wonderful!!! It came in a fine package and the mattress was air sealed. The mattress is not super soft or hard however it is just right and super comfortable to sleep on! This mattress is too comfortable and it has improved my sleeping quality. My last mattress was too hard which made my shoulder have some pain when sleeping however this mattress is different. This mattress is not hard and my shoulder wouldn’t feel any pain when sleeping. The quality of this mattress is amazing! I really recommend this mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Good support for backpain
customer_reviews.text: It was the first time I ordered so much expensive things on Amazon. I was worried and tried in this special time (covid-19). I compared a lot of mattress on Amazon by reviews then made a final decision to bought it. The package is very heavy, it took our a hard time to move to upstair. But it worth all the hard work! Good support real make my back relief. I feel so lucky to have it. It's a great adventure purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this mattress so far.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a week now since I got this new mattress and I am happy with it. I couldn't believe that it fit into as small of a box as it did. It took about 12 hours to expand fully and then we put it on the bed. I have slept well on it. Much better than my old mattress. I have lower back pain sometimes at night and have not had any since I started sleeping on this new mattress. It gives good support and my back is really happy about that. Hopefully it will last me several years. It's so nice to get a full night's sleep. Thanks to my new bed, that's happening.
customer_reviews.author: Rimma

customer_reviews.title: Not the usual “foam” mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! I was reluctant to try another “foam” mattress but came across this hybrid while searching on amazon for mattress options. It had great reviews and decided to give it a try. Best decision! This mattress is so comfortable and I sleep better than I have in years. I have tried foam mattress in the past and found then to be very uncomfortable. The inner springs in this mattress are the key to it being a “real” mattress. Love it and wish I would have ordered it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy conley

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Top Doesn't Expand
customer_reviews.text: This 12" mattress never expanded beyond 10". The only reason I gave two stars instead of one is because Amazon customer service was awesome. When I called to return it they said I could do that or they could give me a 20% discount. I took the discount and bought an awesome pillow topper and now I have an incredible bed that is so comfortable! Even with the discount, I still had to pay an additional $50 but was so worth it! If I had to do it all again, I would do it the same way. I ended up with an inexpensive mattress and a fantastic mattress topper for such a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can trust this purchase for quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the, chance to use this bed, now for sometime. I have only praise for the, quality and comfort. I followed the instruction for setting up and wait time before using it. It expanded from out of the, box perfectly. I have had friends lay on the bed and they agree that; it’s very comfortable. I have the, King size, plush. The price for this match could not be found in brick and mortar store. Great buy, I’m most happy. I just found I had not submitted this review. It has gotten even better and time goes on and my sleeping comfortably is assured.
customer_reviews.author: stormn1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is great! We purchased it for a top bunk and needed something that was of good quality for a great price and that is exactly what we got with this mattress! It comes rolled up and air-vacuumed but once you open the plastic it quickly begins to retake its intended shape. For a family on a budget I am extremely happy with the quality of the item! This mattress won't be very hard ,it is good for my back! I highly recommend it to anyone needing a new mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

product_meta.title: Sweetnight Queen Mattress in a Box - 12 Inch Plush Pillow Top Hybrid Mattress, Gel Memory Foam for Sleep Cool, Motion Isolating Individually Wrapped Coils, Queen Size, Twilight
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:12INCHSweetnight mattress in a box, smartly shipped to your door for easy set up. NO RISK - We as the maker, the fair price mattress you can get. Our bed mattresses come with 10 years. - Over 96% of our customers keep their queen size spring hybrid mattress and refer it to others. - 24/7 email support. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, contact us at any time. About Sweetnight Mattresses We know how hard it is to find the perfect mattress that just fits. We believe everyone should sleep well and feel refreshed after a night of rest. After over 10, 000 users experience, feedback, studies people, bodies, countless material testing. We have created this queen size bed mattress just for you! What makes sweet night Hybrid mattress so different? -Breathable quilted knit pillow top cover, bright gray side panels, perfect queen mattress design. Say goodbye to ugly pale mattress. -The gel memory foam layer breathable and slowly adjusts to your body temperature. What is in the box? 1x Sweetnight hybrid mattress 1x night sleep opener 1x manual & card Note: Please follow the guides in the manual accordingly. - endeavors to open your mattress package within 72 hours of receipt and allow 72 hours for your new mattress to return to its original, plush shape.
feature_bullets: Motion isolation for a peaceful undisturbed sleep- sweet night 12 inch Queen mattress constructed with 775 coils individually wrapped innerspring and Gel Memory Foam for ultimate support, pressure relief helps those with back pain, tossing & turning. It moves independently to prevent motion transfer between partners for an undisturbed night of rest. This Queen mattress Resists sagging, roll-off, and with medium-firm feel.

3-Zone pocket spring contoured for optimal support- the 3 zone independent pocketed spring design ensures that your body weight is evenly absorbed and distributed comprehensively from head to toe throughout the mattress. Also provides the targeted support to your body, proper back support & alignment. The gel memory Foam layer for slowly adjusts to body weight & temperature, it provides a buffer so you never feel the coils for optimal comfort.

Health and bed mattresses. Quilted knit pillow Top cover is skin friendly. Certipur-us Certified foam made without harmful substances like formaldehyde, Mercury, and other heavy metals. High Quality carbon steel spring coil for the rust & deformation prevention. Enjoy a healthier sleep with this queen size mattress with your partner.

No risk - as the brand owner and maker, the best price Mattress you can get. Our bed mattresses comes with 10 years. If there are any reason you are unsatisfied, contact US at any time for support. Over 96% of our customers keep their Queen size hybrid mattress and refer it to others.

Smartly shipped & easy set up- our mattresses Queen size are compressed, rolled & shipped in a box conveniently to your door for easy set up. They fit all Queen size frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform. Recovery of 72 hours is recommended for your new mattress to get to its original, plush shape and dissipate the odor
